Package ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RdaCloudletScheduler
    This interface enhanced the VM scheduler with the necessary methods that are required to be implemented when using the RDA module.
    RdaVmScheduler
    VM Schedulers to be used within the RDA module, must either implement this interface or the RdaUserAwareVmScheduler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MaxMinAlgorithm
    This class is an implementation of the max-min fair share (MMFS) algorithm.
    RdaCloudlet
    This Cloudlet works in a progress aware way.
    RdaCloudletSchedulerDynamicWorkload
    Implements a policy of scheduling performed by a virtual machine.
    RdaDatacenter
    This data center implementation must be used, when using the RDA module.
    RdaHost
    This RDA specific host, supports the resource dependency aware scheduling mechanisms and represents like its superclass an individual host in the datacenter that may run VMs.
    RdaVm
    The RdaVm particularly supports multiple resources.
    VmSchedulerDRF
    This VM scheduler is the Dominan Resource Fairness (DRF) VM scheduler to be used within the RDA module.
    VmSchedulerMaxMinFairShare
    This VM scheduler is the standard VM scheduler to be used within the RDA module.
